title: Unelmia Italiassa
overview: A series about Ellen Jokikunnas and her spouse Jari fulfilling their long-time dreams takes viewers to the stunning landscapes of Italy. They have dreamed of a second home in Italy but thought they could only make that dream come true after having a child. However, life can't wait forever, so they buy a 200-year-old stone house in Italy and start renovating it.
